sentences.sContent: ...But anyway I'll send him an email to request a meeting...
I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.sCn: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

synos.tran: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

words.tran: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样

trans.tranOther: used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement
